```{r setup}
library(terra)

```

# Wind speed {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| eval: false
"https://globalwindatlas.info/api/gis/country/PHL/wind-speed/10" |>
  download.file(destfile = "data/wind/PHL_wind-speed_10m.tif", method = "curl")
area <- list.files("data/umrbpl/", full.names = TRUE, pattern = "shp$") |>
  read_sf() |>
  st_transform(crs = "EPSG:4326")
"data/wind/PHL_wind-speed_10m.tif" |>
  rast() |>
  mask(area) |>
  writeRaster("data/wind/UMRBPL_wind-speed_10m.tif")
```
```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
"data/wind/UMRBPL_wind-speed_10m.tif" |>
  rast() |>
  plot()
```
